label: 目代
本: The Kamakura Bakufu:  A Study in Documents . Stanford University Press . 1976
説明文: Most commonly, the personal deputy of an absentee provincial governor. Often the most immediate link between central authority and the provincial office. The tension between mokudai and resident officers (zaichōkanjin) was a major impetus for the Gempei War.　[在庁官人]
